Posts.Content: I also had the "cord" in my arm following all my treatment...I can not recall the name for this cord.....but it is not uncommon.....Mine eventually went away.......But I do remember that the discomfort limited me for awhile.....you might ask your doctor if there are at home remedies that might help ease the tightness and pain.   Survivor since 2004
Posts.Title: Pain 10 months after having lymph nodes removed

Posts.Content: I reread your message...sorry I didn't realize that the docs did not know about it either.  Actually my surgeon diagnosed it immediately...he said it would go away and it did.....   I would be careful using warm packs due to lymphedema....I gently massaged my arm and area   If I can recall the name of the cord......I will post it later.   Donna
Posts.Title: Pain 10 months after having lymph nodes removed
